parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle in Vehicle Transport </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns bool array if it is possible to load cargo inside vehicle and if possible to load cargo into empty vehicle  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[canVehicleCargo]] cargo </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle carrying cargo </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>  cargo: [[Object]] - cargo to put in vehicle </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [WillFitIntoCurrentVehicle, WillFitIntoEmptyVehicle] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Blackfish with no vehicle cargo loaded
<code>_result = blackfish [[canVehicleCargo]] offroad; //[true, true]
</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Blackfish with one vehicle cargo called offroad already loaded
<code>_result = blackfish [[canVehicleCargo]] offroad; //[false, false]
</code>
Even if the Blackfish was empty offroad can't be loaded because it is already in a cargo space </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Blackfish with one vehicle cargo called offroad already loaded
<code>_result = blackfish [[canVehicleCargo]] offroad2; //[false, true]
</code>
offroad2 can't be loaded because there isn't enough space in the Blackfish, but if there was space offroad2 could be loaded into the Blackfish </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma_3_Vehicle_in_Vehicle_Transport| Vehicle in Vehicle Transport ]] [[setVehicleCargo]] [[enableVehicleCargo]] [[getVehicleCargo]] [[isVehicleCargo]] [[vehicleCargoEnabled]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
